page.title: 09TRANSPORT SURVEY
page.content: 19 PEOPLE WERE QUESTIONED IN DIDCOT & HARWELL.14(74%)LIVE IN DIDCOT,50% FEMALE.VEHICLES USED FOR BUSINESS:CARS 11;VANS-4;LORRIES-1;BUSES-4;TRAIN-2;MO TOR-'CYCLE-1;BICYCLES-6;WALK-8. VEHICLES OWNED (17 OF 19):CARS-15;VANS-4;LORRIES-1;MINI-BUSE S-2;MOTOR-CYCLES-3;BICYCLES-9. NUMBER OF TIMES PUBLIC TRANSPORT WAS USED IN ONE WEEK:NONE-11 TIMES;ONCE-3 TIMES;TWICE-2 TIMES;THREE TIMES-ONCE:FOUR TIMES-NONE ;FIVE TIMES-TWO TIMES. 84% THOUGHT PUBLIC TRANSPORT HAD BECOME MORE COMFORTABLE. 68% THOUGHT THERE WAS NOT ENOUGH PUBLIC TRANSPORT. 68% THOUGHT THE SERVICE COULD BE IMPROVED.
